title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers
descriptions:
Introducing the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers! These soft and comfortable pillow covers are perfect for adding a touch of luxury to your home. With a pack of 2, you can effortlessly enhance the look of your couch, sofa, or bed.

Made from 100% velvet, these pillow covers provide a plush and cozy texture that you'll love to sink into. The elegant gold color adds a touch of sophistication to any room. The dimensions of these covers are 18 x 18 inches (45 x 45 cm), making them the perfect size for standard throw pillows.

The invisible zipper closure ensures a seamless and sleek appearance, while the longer than 35cm zipper length makes it easy to insert and remove your pillows. These covers are tailored for 18 x 18 inch or 20 x 20 inch inserts, providing a perfect fit.

Versatile and practical, these pillow covers can be used in various settings, including the living room, bedroom, chair, window seat, coffee shop, office, or even in your car. The machine washable feature allows for easy cleaning, simply use cold water and low drying temperature to maintain their quality.

We value your satisfaction and are always here to assist you. If you have any suggestions or improvements, our customer support is available to help. Elevate your home decor with the GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers!
